pullrequest.title: copy and paste added to edit menu.

content.raw:
Oops, just seeing this now. I would make the order: 

Undo 

Redo

Copy

Paste

Reset Model Poses

Reset World

Open Building Editor 

Open Model Editor

Note that I added "Open" to the last two items to match the leading verb in the other options.
